title: Veritaserum
effects;recipe: The drinker is forced to answer any question with whatever they believe is the truth.
memorable_usages: It must be brewed for 28 days, or one lunar phase.
more_information: Veritaserum was used When Dumbledore found out that Barty Crouch Jr. was disguised as Alastor Moody, the Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher.

title: Felix Felices
description: Its color is molten gold. When inside a cauldron, drops of the liquid will leap above the surface
